issue.title: [CF 1028] Lone Wolf buffs not included in buff categories
issue.body:
The Lone Wolf version of hunter buffs aren't currently included in TMW's buff "categories" (not sure what they're actually called)...

http://www.wowhead.com/search?q=lone wolf#spells

As an example, IncreasedStats does not include Lone Wolf: Power of the Primates.


> Posted by CurseForge user ywfn | Imported from CurseForge issue #1028 | Raw

comments.body:
You would think that since I main a hunter I would have remembered these, but apparently not. I'll add them in ASAP.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in g7264c24


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
